im still waitin on u to get a life…never gunna happen?

yep just like i expected…some more white fags bein racist…im mixed wit black…another fourm thats shit.

A.) You keep calling me Nigga
B.) I am nto racist, the only black people I hate are those who think they are gangsta’s and all tough
C.) Your illitirate

C.) you can kiss my ass

dont fuckin judge me if you dont know me.[/quote]

You tell me not to judge you, yet you have judged me 5 times saying I have no life, etc… Where is this proof? Your getting off way too easy here… Contradictions + Hypocritical statments are not a good combination.

Anyways, I’m done.

item.title: Mopar...wdf is that?
item.dc:creator: @roll3blunts roll3blunts
item.description:
@roll3blunts wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:20, topic:3168”][quote author=roll3blunts link=topic=3664.msg36225#msg36225 date=1148368556]

www.justfuckinggoogleit.com

dont get fuckin smart wit me u damn 9 yr old prick. it was just a question.

i think its a stupid name…i mean come on…say it with me…“mopar”…sounds lame to me.
[/quote]

Hmmm, I should be angered by that? Well, if you know I’m 9 years old, answer the following for me:

  1. How come I can spell a hell of a lot more better than you?
  2. Why is it supposed to insult me? Being an age isn’t insulting.
  3. Are you really that immature to get so wound up over that site? I get told to fucking google it everyday, I don’t go “omgz! u tld m3 t0 fuck1ng g00gl3 it u dum 9 yr 0ld!”
  4. Are you a pervert?
  5. Google is the answer to everything!
  6. I’m 14, yet more mature than you. Fucked up or what?
  7. N00b pl0x?

Now, I understand some of them might not be questions, but I hope you can answer them. Also, you insult me, or any other of the respected members on this thread, you will get insulted and owned back…You will also become very unpopular round here. The key to making friends round here is to be nice…This isn’t Sythe!

kthx ownt[/quote]

i got 4 words for you…shut the fuck up.
i got some more words for u…im 16 bitch ill fuck your mom and ur sister at the same time while u watch bitch it aint a damn thing. fuckin white kids dont know shit…what in the hell is a “noob”? god damn i know damn well ur not 14…14 my ass ur 9 yrs old. am i a pervert? wdf kind of question is that? do u see me postin girls nude and shit? no u dont…god damn why in the fuck am i even on this site? fuckin full of 9 yr olds…peace bitch i aint gettin back on here. i rather die then to sit here and watch a couple kids go “omg you cant spell” “noob”…actin like ur fuckin god…u aint shit. fuckin pricks dont got a life so u go to a rs cheating fourm and act like ur sombody…ur nobody. ur shit. get a fuckin life bitch.
